title: Biodegradable Pots
message: Consider using biodegradable pots made from coconut coir or bamboo.

title: Non-Toxic Pest Control
message: Use neem oil or soapy water as natural pest repellents.

title: Composting Tips
message: Start composting in the fall for the best results.

title: Watering Reminder
message: Water your plants early in the morning to reduce evaporation.
